entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is Ron's pet rat, described as struggling and thin with bald patches.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts, trying to calm down Scabbers.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper at Hogwarts, warning Harry, Ron, and Hermione about an approaching group of men.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts, walking down the castle steps with Cornelius Fudge.

entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: Fudge is the Minister of Magic, walking down the castle steps with Dumbledore.

entities.name: macnair
entities.description: Macnair is an executioner, part of the group approaching Hogwarts.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts, picking up the cloak to help Harry and Ron escape.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts, being warned by Hagrid about the approaching group of men.
